This is an ideal family home for the discerning buyer.']

descriptions: ["DescriptionKAYE & CO REAL ESTATE L.L.C. welcomes you to this large 3 bedroom plus maid's room located in the prestigious Burj Khalifa Tower.\xa0Property Details:\xa03 BR plus Maid's Room with 2,323 sqftUnfurnished and vacantPanoramic Living Room without any columns/pillars3 Bathrooms plus Powder RoomOverlooks the DIFC and Ocean on the horizonBuilt in TV Cabinet, Wine Chiller and Open Plan KitchenBrand new installed electrical blinds2 Parking SpacesMaster Bedroom has large walk-in closet and bathroomType 3B -\xa0based in Zone 3 - Mid floorsAED 4,589,900Building Amenities:\xa0Indoor link to Dubai MallSky lounge for residents (123rd\xa0floor)24/7 ConciergeTennis Court x 2 + Basketball on SaturdaysGym + Swimming Pool x 2Business Center on 43rd\xa0FloorMeeting Rooms on 43rd\xa0and 76th\xa0FloorZoom Supermarket on Ground Floor6 Armani Restaurants with 15% discount for residentsHousekeeping, carwash and laundry available as a service\xa0Please feel free to contact Eugen at\xa0+971504200350\xa0for any additional information.Burj Khalifa is truly a mixed-use tower, comprises 1.85 million square feet of residential space, and 300,000 square feet of office space, in addition to the Armani Hotel Dubai and Armani Residences. It also features lounges, health and wellness facilities, four pools and two observation decks.\xa0KAYE & CO.\xa0is a privately-run real estate firm with more than fifteen years of local industry experience.\xa0We are a Burj Khalifa tower focused agency and if you are looking for somebody that can guide you through the tower with few different layouts and views - please contact me to book your site visit today."]

['DescriptionValco Properties is pleased to offer this 1 Bedroom Apartment in Lake Point Tower, JLT.

Lake Point is a residential building offering hundreds of apartments ranging from one, two and three bedroom units with equipped kitchen, high quality fixtures, fittings, and finishes. It is primarily  located within the Jumeirah Lake Towers which is one of the largest free-zone developments in the UAE, a master development comprising high-rise residential and commercial buildings, as well as designed as a living and working community clustered around the man-made lakes and park land with easy access to Sheikh Zayed Road and Dubai Metro station. 
Contact Alex Safepour at +97144548339 or +971555075020 to schedule a private viewing of this lovely apartment or send an email to alex@valco-properties.com for more information.']

location1: ['Marina VistaDubai, Dubai Harbour, EMAAR Beachfront']
descriptions:
['DescriptionComprising 27 high end buildings Emaar Beachfront-Dubai Harbor will also host 5 star hotels like The Address Hotel, 750 m private beach for residents on either side, The tallest lighthouse in the world, largest passenger terminal in the Mena area with a capacity to handle 6,000 passengers. Located in between Marina and the Palm Emaar Beachfront is the perfect spot for both investors and end users.
Marina Vista is located on the Marina side offers premium apartments with floor to ceiling windows, offering ample natural light. The L shaped building ensures great views of either the sea and Palm side or the Marina skyline side.
Features:
• Beach access
• High-End finishings
• 1,2,3,4 Bedroom options also available
• Partial Sea and Palm view
• Easy access to main roads
Payment Plan:
• 10% Booking
• 50% during construction
• 40% on Handover Dec 2021.
About Inspire Real Estate:
Welcome to Inspire Real Estate, the city’s premier real estate consultancy. Founded within months of the first decree creating freehold property rights, Inspire Real Estate has consistently applied international standards of transparency and due diligence to the buying, selling and leasing of residential and commercial property. Since its inception in 2004, the company has given investors a quick and safe access to this extraordinary market, such that it has become known as one of the single most efficient, full-service property consultancies in the region.']
